projects.name: Social Media App - Hobnob
projects.description: Ideated and developing a website where people can interact with each other by creating communities. Utilized MERN stack to develop and deploy authentication, search functionality, and messaging features, enhancing overall user experience.

projects.name: Human Fall Detection Using ML (Research Project)
projects.description: Developed a ML-based human fall detection system using MediaPipe and OpenCV on the UR Fall Detection Dataset, enhancing accuracy in real-time fall identification. Implemented advanced computer vision techniques for efficient pose estimation, significantly improving emergency response times for fall incidents.

projects.name: Timetable Allocation System
projects.description: Developed a timetable allocation system that combines genetic algorithms for course sequencing with heuristic search for slot assignment, ensuring optimal resource use and lecturer availability. Designed and executed experiments to validate the systems effectiveness, achieving maximum fitness values indicating successful scheduling of all courses within specified constraints.

projects.name: Discord Bot
projects.description: Developed a real-time discord bot application using the Discord API, implementing mini-games and interactions within the Discord platform. Extended the bots features to implement other tasks on the same platform.

experiences.description: Spearheaded a rigorous research initiative focusing on pioneering advancements in stock market prediction through machine learning methodologies. Leveraged cutting-edge techniques to analyze historical stock data, resulting in a predictive model that showcased a 15% increase in accuracy compared to traditional methods. Collaborated with a multidisciplinary team to refine algorithms, contributing to an innovative research project with potential implications for financial markets.
